entities.name: forest
entities.description: The forest is mentioned as the location where something is happening. The text states 'pointing over the forest'.

entities.name: broomstick
entities.description: A broomstick is mentioned as a comparison to the size of the object hurtling across the sky. The text states 'larger than a broomstick — or, indeed, a hundred broomsticks'.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The castle is mentioned as the location where something is happening. The text states 'toward the castle' and 'the lights shining from the castle windows hit it'.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: A dragon is mentioned as a possible explanation for what is hurtling across the sky. The text states 'It’s a dragon!'

entities.name: house
entities.description: A house is mentioned as a comparison to the size of the object hurtling across the sky. The text states 'the size of a large house'.

entities.name: carriage
entities.description: A horse-drawn carriage is revealed to be what is actually hurtling across the sky. The text states 'a gigantic, powder-blue, horse-drawn carriage'.

relationships.description: Dennis Creevey correctly identifies what is hurtling across the sky as a flying house. The text states 'Dennis’s guess was closer'.
